name: Particle Runner
description:
*APK can be downloaded

Particle Runner gives you control to the smallest particles of the world. You're captured between the colorful waves of light. Enjoy but beware the angry photons. Particle Runner is an quick and addictive game. Focus, timing and speed is what you need. Controls are simple, one-tap to change the gravity of the particle. Collect photons to unlock more particles, with more health.

Game is in development and is ment for publishing on google play.

Features:
- 20 particles to unlock

- just use left mouse button to control particle

Special thanks for the composer of the soundtrack - Nihilore - As Nihilism Gives Way To Existentialism.
